imdb.plot outline: Episode 1 - Mr. Bolan has made his decision on who his new broadcasters will be. They start the semester off with their first broadcast! Episode 2 - Kyle continues to use the Broadcasting class platform to showcase his goofiness to the student body but also to impress Ashley. Episode 3 - Mr. Bolan struggles with the School Board and the team, led by Kyle, tries pushing the show in a more entertaining direction. Episode 4 -Mr. Bolan tries to keep his job, while Kyle tries to apologize to the student body. Episode 5 - Kyle hears Carl's secret and the crew heads outside for the Broadcast. Episode 6 - Mr. Bolan battles demons, while Kyle asks a very special question. Episode 7 - Mr. Bolan, Kyle, Carl, and Ashley wrap up their semester.
